trans-unit.source: Provides a design-time view of data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Visar data för designtid den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDesignerDataSourceView"></xref> class with the provided data source designer and view name.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDesignerDataSourceView"> </xref> klass med angivna designer och visa namnet på datakällan.

trans-unit.source: The parent <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Överordnat <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.LinqDataSourceDesigner"> </xref> objekt.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*> method.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> objekt som är associerad med aktuellt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> styra stöder den <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*>metoden är stöds, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteDelete*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*> method.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*>metoden är stöds, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteInsert*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports paging through the data that is retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*> method.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> objekt som är associerad med aktuellt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen stöder sidindelning via de data som hämtas av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if paging through the data that is retrieved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om sidindelning via de data som hämtas av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*>metoden är stöds, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports a sorted view of the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> objekt som är associerad med aktuellt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen stöder en sorterad vy av den underliggande datakällan.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a sorted view of the underlying data source is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om en sorterad vy av den underliggande datakällan stöds. Annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"></xref> object that is associated with the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"></xref> control supports the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*> method.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView"> </xref> objekt som är associerad med aktuellt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSource"> </xref> styra stöder den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*>metoden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*> method is supported; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*>metoden är stöds, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ExecuteUpdate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the design-time data that matches the schema of the associated data source control by using the specified number of rows.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar data för designtid som matchar schemat för källkontroll associerade data med hjälp av det angivna antalet rader.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the data is sample or real data.
trans-unit.target: Returnerar ett värde som anger om aktuella data är prov eller verkliga data.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows to return.
trans-unit.target: Minsta antal rader som ska returneras.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the returned data is sample data; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to indicate that the returned data is live data.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>att ange att data som returnerades är exempeldata; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> att indikera att data som returnerades är realtidsdata.

trans-unit.source: The data to display at design time.
trans-unit.target: Data att visa i designläge.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType*> property contains an object that derives from <xref href="System.Data.Linq.DataContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType*>egenskapen innehåller ett objekt som härleds från <xref href="System.Data.Linq.DataContext"> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType*> property is derived from <xref href="System.Data.Linq.DataContext"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om objektet i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType*>egenskapen härleds från <xref href="System.Data.Linq.DataContext"> </xref>, annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.ContextType*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName*> property returns a <xref:System.Data.Linq.Table%601> type.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar ett värde som anger om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName*>egenskapen returnerar en <xref:System.Data.Linq.Table%601> typ.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName*> property returns a <xref:System.Data.Linq.Table%601> type; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Om den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName*>egenskapen returnerar en <xref:System.Data.Linq.Table%601> skriver; annars <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinqDataSourceView.TableName*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the schema that describes the data source view that is represented by the current view object.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar det schema som beskriver datakällvyn som representeras av det aktuella objektet i vyn.

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the schema.
trans-unit.target: Ett objekt som representerar schemat.
